Seven is famous for being _the_ magic number of Mesopotamia  

(7 Bridges, towers, walls, gates, gods, days of week, sisters, â€¦)  

# seven gods
The seven gods where: Sun, Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn  

# Seven angels
Yazidi people of Upper Mesopotamia, an area at the border of Iraq, Syria, and Turkey. Their faith focuses on seven of Godâ€™s angels, the first among those being Melek Taus.
